entryValidationRulesParser: [IF !(plantStatus IN ('Removed', 'No longer qualifies', 'Lost, burned', 'Lost, herbivory', 'Lost, presumed dead', 'Lost, tag damaged', 'Lost, fate unknown', 'Downed'))& !(growthForm ='sms') & !(tagStatus IN ('removed', 'mislabeled')), REQUIRE][IF !(plantStatus IN ('Removed', 'No longer qualifies', 'Lost, burned', 'Lost, herbivory', 'Lost, presumed dead', 'Lost, tag damaged', 'Lost, fate unknown', 'Downed')) & !(growthForm ='sms') & !(tagStatus IN ('removed', 'mislabeled')), GREATER_THAN(0)]
